casebody.data:
CYGNUS CORPORATION, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee, and Professional and Scientific Associates, Inc., Defendant. No. 2006-5130. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. June 7, 2007.

Before SCHALL and BRYSON, Circuit Judges, and HOLDERMAN, Chief Judge.*

Honorable James F. Holderman, Chief Judge, United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois, sitting by designation.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
